verses.verse: Φοβηθῶμεν <WG5399> Phobēthōmen let us be careful ( The Sabbath Rest) οὖν <WG3767> oun Therefore , μή‿ <WG3361> mē that none ποτε <WG4219> pote . . . καταλειπομένης <WG2641> kataleipomenēs still stands , ἐπαγγελίας <WG1860> epangelias [ while ] the promise εἰσελθεῖν <WG1525> eiselthein of entering εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κατάπαυσιν <WG2663> katapausin rest αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His δοκῇ <WG1380> dokē be deemed τις <WG5100> tis . . . ἐξ <WG1537> ex of ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you ὑστερηκέναι <WG5302> hysterēkenai to have fallen short [of it] .

καὶ <WG2532> kai also γάρ <WG1063> gar For ἐσμεν <WG1510> esmen we εὐηγγελισμένοι <WG2097> euēngelismenoi received the good news καθάπερ <WG2509> kathaper just as κἀκεῖνοι <WG2548> kakeinoi they [did] ; ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ὠφέλησεν <WG5623> ōphelēsen was of no value ὁ <WG3588> ho the λόγος <WG3056> logos message τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἀκοῆς <WG189> akoēs they heard ἐκείνους <WG1565> ekeinous to them , μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv συγκεκερασμένους* <WG4786> synkekerasmenous since they did not share τῇ <WG3588> tē the πίστει <WG4102> pistei faith τοῖς <WG3588> tois of those who ἀκούσασιν <WG191> akousasin comprehended [it] . ( Literally not having been united in the faith of those who heard)

Εἰσερχόμεθα <WG1525> Eiserchometha enter γὰρ <WG1063> gar Now εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn [that] κατάπαυσιν <WG2663> katapausin rest . οἱ <WG3588> hoi [we] who πιστεύσαντες <WG4100> pisteusantes have believed καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs [As for the others, ] it is just as εἴρηκεν <WG2046> eirēken [God] has said : Ὡς <WG5613> Hōs “ So ὤμοσα <WG3660> ōmosa I swore on oath ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - ὀργῇ <WG3709> orgē anger , μου <WG1473> mou My Εἰ <WG1487> Ei ‘ vvv εἰσελεύσονται <WG1525> eiseleusontai They shall never enter εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κατάπαυσίν <WG2663> katapausin rest .’” ( ; also in verse 5) μου <WG1473> mou My Καίτοι <WG2543> Kaitoi And yet τῶν <WG3588> tōn [His] ἔργων <WG2041> ergōn works ἀπὸ <WG575> apo since καταβολῆς <WG2602> katabolēs [the] foundation κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou of [the] world . γενηθέντων <WG1096> genēthentōn have been finished

εἴρηκεν <WG2046> eirēken He has spoken γάρ <WG1063> gar For που <WG4225> pou somewhere περὶ <WG4012> peri about τῆς <WG3588> tēs the ἑβδόμης <WG1442> hebdomēs seventh [day] οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs in this manner : Καὶ <WG2532> Kai “ And κατέπαυσεν <WG2664> katepausen rested ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God ἐν <WG1722> en on τῇ <WG3588> tē the ἡμέρᾳ <WG2250> hēmera day τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἑβδόμῃ <WG1442> hebdomē seventh ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from πάντων <WG3956> pantōn all τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἔργων <WG2041> ergōn works .” ( ) αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἐν <WG1722> en [as He says] in τούτῳ <WG3778> toutō [the passage above] : πάλιν <WG3825> palin again , Εἰ <WG1487> Ei vvv εἰσελεύσονται <WG1525> eiseleusontai “ They shall never enter εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κατάπαυσίν <WG2663> katapausin rest . ” μου <WG1473> mou My

Ἐπεὶ <WG1893> Epei Since , οὖν <WG3767> oun then , ἀπολείπεται <WG620> apoleipetai it remains [for] τινὰς <WG5100> tinas some εἰσελθεῖν <WG1525> eiselthein to enter εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . αὐτήν <WG846> autēn [His rest] , καὶ <WG2532> kai and [since] οἱ <WG3588> hoi those who πρότερον <WG4386> proteron formerly εὐαγγελισθέντες <WG2097> euangelisthentes heard the good news οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv εἰσῆλθον <WG1525> eisēlthon did not enter δι’ <WG1223> di’ because of ἀπείθειαν <WG543> apeitheian [their] disobedience ,

πάλιν <WG3825> palin vvv τινὰ <WG5100> tina a certain ὁρίζει <WG3724> horizei [God] again designated ἡμέραν <WG2250> hēmeran day [as] Σήμερον <WG4594> Sēmeron “ Today , ” ἐν <WG1722> en through Δαυὶδ <WG1138> Dauid David λέγων <WG3004> legōn He spoke μετὰ <WG3326> meta later τοσοῦτον <WG5118> tosouton when a long χρόνον <WG5550> chronon time καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs as προείρηται <WG4302> proeirētai was just stated : Σήμερον <WG4594> Sēmeron “ Today , ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if τῆς <WG3588> tēs - φωνῆς <WG5456> phōnēs voice , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His ἀκούσητε <WG191> akousēte you hear μὴ <WG3361> mē do not σκληρύνητε <WG4645> sklērynēte harden τὰς <WG3588> tas - καρδίας <WG2588> kardias hearts .” ( ) ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your

Εἰ <WG1487> Ei if γὰρ <WG1063> gar For αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous . . . , Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Joshua κατέπαυσεν <WG2664> katepausen had given them rest οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἂν <WG302> an vvv περὶ <WG4012> peri about ἄλλης <WG243> allēs another ἐλάλει <WG2980> elalei [God] would not have spoken μετὰ <WG3326> meta later ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta . . . ἡμέρας <WG2250> hēmeras day .

ἄρα <WG686> ara then , ἀπολείπεται <WG620> apoleipetai There remains , σαββατισμὸς <WG4520> sabbatismos a Sabbath rest τῷ <WG3588> tō for the λαῷ <WG2992> laō people τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God .

ὁ <WG3588> ho whoever γὰρ <WG1063> gar For εἰσελθὼν <WG1525> eiselthōn enters εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κατάπαυσιν <WG2663> katapausin rest αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [God’s] καὶ <WG2532> kai also αὐτὸς <WG846> autos - κατέπαυσεν <WG2664> katepausen rests ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from τῶν <WG3588> tōn [own] ἔργων <WG2041> ergōn work , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his ὥσπερ <WG5618> hōsper just as ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from τῶν <WG3588> tōn [His] ἰδίων <WG2398> idiōn . . . . ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεός <WG2316> Theos God [did]

Σπουδάσωμεν <WG4704> Spoudasōmen Let us, therefore, make every effort οὖν <WG3767> oun . . . εἰσελθεῖν <WG1525> eiselthein to enter εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . ἐκείνην <WG1565> ekeinēn that τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κατάπαυσιν <WG2663> katapausin rest , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that μὴ <WG3361> mē no ἐν <WG1722> en by [following] τῷ <WG3588> tō the αὐτῷ <WG846> autō same τις <WG5100> tis one ὑποδείγματι <WG5262> hypodeigmati pattern πέσῃ <WG4098> pesē will fall τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἀπειθείας <WG543> apeitheias of disobedience .

Ζῶν <WG2198> Zōn [is] living ( The Living Word) γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ὁ <WG3588> ho the λόγος <WG3056> logos word τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐνεργὴς <WG1756> energēs active . καὶ <WG2532> kai - τομώτερος <WG5114> tomōteros Sharper ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper than πᾶσαν <WG3956> pasan any μάχαιραν <WG3162> machairan sword , δίστομον <WG1366> distomon double-edged καὶ <WG2532> kai even διϊκνούμενος <WG1338> diiknoumenos it pierces ἄχρι <WG891> achri to μερισμοῦ <WG3311> merismou dividing ψυχῆς <WG5590> psychēs soul καὶ <WG2532> kai and πνεύματος <WG4151> pneumatos spirit , ἁρμῶν <WG719> harmōn joints τε <WG5037> te - καὶ <WG2532> kai and μυελῶν <WG3452> myelōn marrow . καὶ <WG2532> kai - κριτικὸς <WG2924> kritikos It judges ἐνθυμήσεων <WG1761> enthymēseōn [the] thoughts καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐννοιῶν <WG1771> ennoiōn intentions καρδίας <WG2588> kardias of [the] heart .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - οὐκ <WG3756> ouk Nothing ἔστιν <WG1510> estin is κτίσις <WG2937> ktisis in all creation ἀφανὴς <WG852> aphanēs hidden ἐνώπιον <WG1799> enōpion from [God’s] sight αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou . . . ; πάντα <WG3956> panta everything δὲ <WG1161> de - γυμνὰ <WG1131> gymna [is] uncovered καὶ <WG2532> kai and τετραχηλισμένα <WG5136> tetrachēlismena exposed τοῖς <WG3588> tois before the ὀφθαλμοῖς <WG3788> ophthalmois eyes αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou of Him πρὸς <WG4314> pros to ὃν <WG3739> hon whom ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin we [must give] ὁ <WG3588> ho - λόγος <WG3056> logos account .

Ἔχοντες <WG2192> Echontes since we have οὖν <WG3767> oun Therefore , ἀρχιερέα <WG749> archierea high priest μέγαν <WG3173> megan a great διεληλυθότα <WG1330> dielēlythota who has passed through τοὺς <WG3588> tous the οὐρανούς <WG3772> ouranous heavens , Ἰησοῦν <WG2424> Iēsoun Jesus τὸν <WG3588> ton the Υἱὸν <WG5207> Huion Son τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God , κρατῶμεν <WG2902> kratōmen let us hold firmly to τῆς <WG3588> tēs what ὁμολογίας <WG3671> homologias we profess .

οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἔχομεν <WG2192> echomen we do not have ἀρχιερέα <WG749> archierea a high priest μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv δυνάμενον <WG1410> dynamenon who is unable συμπαθῆσαι <WG4834> sympathēsai to sympathize ταῖς <WG3588> tais with ἀσθενείαις <WG769> astheneiais weaknesses , ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our πεπειρασμένον <WG3985> pepeirasmenon one who was tempted δὲ <WG1161> de but [we have] κατὰ <WG2596> kata in πάντα <WG3956> panta every way καθ’ <WG2596> kath’ that ὁμοιότητα <WG3665> homoiotēta [we are] , χωρὶς <WG5565> chōris [yet was] without ἁμαρτίας <WG266> hamartias sin .

προσερχώμεθα <WG4334> proserchōmetha Let us then approach οὖν <WG3767> oun vvv μετὰ <WG3326> meta with παρρησίας <WG3954> parrēsias confidence , τῷ <WG3588> tō the θρόνῳ <WG2362> thronō throne τῆς <WG3588> tēs - χάριτος <WG5485> charitos of grace ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that λάβωμεν <WG2983> labōmen we may receive ἔλεος <WG1656> eleos mercy καὶ <WG2532> kai and χάριν <WG5485> charin grace εὕρωμεν <WG2147> heurōmen find εἰς <WG1519> eis to εὔκαιρον <WG2121> eukairon in [our] time of need . βοήθειαν <WG996> boētheian help [us]
